text:
Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at Sultanahmet Offers an unforgattable night under the stars at A’ya rooftop lounge
Located at the rooftop of Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at Sultanahmet, A’YA Lounge is one of the most awe-inspiring terraces of Istanbul with its unbeatable view of Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque. Having various meanings, A’YA stands for beautiful, art, miracle and bird in different languages including Japanese, Arabic and Hebrew. Ottoman art historian and interior designer Serdar Gülgün is the talent behind the charm of the breathtaking terrace.
Now, A’YA has a special offer every Wednesday and Thursday beginning at 9:00 pm for those who wish to enjoy a night under the stars. The Hotel’s Food & Beverage team think that the sky is the limit, and thus A’YA is offering a A’YA Unlimited, a premium beverage package that features unlimited beverages including beer, wine, cocktails or the traditional Turkish drink rakı at a very special price.
The neo-Ottoman rooftop lounge with the massive buttress of Hagia Sophia at eye level is an ideal venue to enjoy evening drinks with a backdrop of Old City, whether staying at Four Seasons or dropping by with friends to enjoy the perfect spot for a memorable sunset in Istanbul.
A’YA Unlimited is offered for TRY 120 per person after 9:00 pm on Wednesdays and Thursdays. A’YA is open daily from 12:00 noon.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotel
